description: An irresistable twist on hasselback potatoes, the pumpkin in this recipe adds a gorgeous sweetness and pairs beautifully with the floral sage and hazelnut stuffing.
name: Hasselback Pumpkin With Stuffing Balls Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Brush pumpkin with syrup. Toss remaining sage leaves in remaining oil to coat and insert into the pumpkin cuts. Bake for a further 20 minutes or until pumpkin is golden and sage is crispy. Transfer pumpkin to a platter, scatter over remaining hazelnuts and serve with stuffing balls and rocket.
